artists.name: Lil Uzi Vert
artists.description: Symphonic trap artist known for his unique vocal style and infectious beats.

artists.name: Future
artists.description: Pioneering trap artist known for his distinctive autotuned vocals and hard-hitting beats.

artists.name: Travis Scott
artists.description: Multi-platinum selling artist known for his energetic live performances and genre-defying sound.

artists.name: Migos
artists.description: Atlanta-based rap trio known for their signature ad-libs and trap-infused beats.

artists.name: Gunna
artists.description: Up-and-coming artist known for his smooth delivery and melodic trap beats.

artists.name: Juice WRLD
artists.description: Late artist known for his emotional and introspective lyrics set to trap beats.

artists.name: Young Thug
artists.description: Innovative trap artist known for his distinctive voice and experimental approach to music.

artists.name: Lil Baby
artists.description: Chart-topping artist known for his storytelling and hard-hitting trap beats.

artists.name: Playboi Carti
artists.description: Experimental trap artist known for his unique style and avant-garde approach to music.

artists.name: Roddy Ricch
artists.description: Grammy-winning artist known for his introspective lyrics and melodic trap beats.
